Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.predefined.powerpointremote.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class manages the connection to the server.

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager(java.lang.String host,
                 int port,
                 java.lang.String key,
                 MainActivity runningOn)
        Create a new ConnectionManager.
        Parameters:
        host - The servers hostname.
        port - The servers port.
        key - The pairing key, entered by the user.
        runningOn - the instance of our MainActivity that created this Thread.
